citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00am on 01-JUL-
21. The inspector spoke to a household member who stated the licensee was not available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00am on 01-JUL-
21.  The inspector spoke to a household member who stated the licensee was not available for inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
